productId.description: ID of parent product for variation to create

id.description: Unique identifier for the resource. read-only

date_created.description: The date the variation  was created, in the site's timezone. read-only

date_created_gmt.description: The date the variation  was created, as GMT. read-only

date_modified.description: The date the variation  was last modified, in the site's timezone. read-only

date_modified_gmt.description: The date the variation  was last modified, as GMT. read-only

date_on_sale_from.description: Start date of sale price, in the site's timezone.

date_on_sale_from_gmt.description: Start date of sale price, as GMT.

date_on_sale_to.description: End date of sale price, in the site's timezone.

date_on_sale_to_gmt.description: End date of sale price, as GMT.

on_sale.description: Shows if the variation is on sale. read-only

status.description: Variation status. Options: draft, pending, private and publish. Default is publish.

purchasable.description: Shows if the variation can be bought. read-only

virtual.description: If the variation is virtual. Default is false.

downloadable.description: If the variation is downloadable. Default is false.

download_limit.description: Number of times downloadable files can be downloaded after purchase. Default is -1.

download_expiry.description: Number of days until access to downloadable files expires. Default is -1.

tax_status.description: Tax status. Options: taxable, shipping and none. Default is taxable.

manage_stock.description: Stock management at variation level. Default is false.

stock_status.description: Controls the stock status of the product. Options: instock, outofstock, onbackorder. Default is instock.

backorders.description: If managing stock, this controls if backorders are allowed. Options: no, notify and yes. Default is no.

backorders_allowed.description: Shows if backorders are allowed. read-only

backordered.description: Shows if the variation is on backordered. read-only
